page.title: 16CLUBS (CONTINUED)
page.content:
Monday evening from six thirty until eight. They quite often make fires cook sausages, beefburgers, beans and baked potatoes. They put up large sleeping tents for practice at camp they have different shaped badges to the Brownies they also play lots of games.
Another activity on Friday evenings is {Youth Club}the age group is from twelve upwards. Usually it is held at a Village Hall but sometimes they go up to the cricket pitch to do rounders and other games it is good.
There is a{Chedworth Silver Band} that plays at fetes and special occasions. There are about thirty people most are adults there are five children not all from Chedworth. The instrument I play is a cornet.
